verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You're the One that I'm living for,
You're the Truth and the life,
There's nothing that I want more,
Than to be with You my God,

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Set a fire in my soul, oh my God
As deep calls out to deep,
Set a fire in my soul, oh my God,
As deep calls out to deep.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I want to burn for You, O my Lord, and my God
I want to burn for You, O my Lord, and my God

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
As the deer pants for the water so my soul longs after You
As the deer pants for the water so my soul longs after You
